articles.title: The Kashmir Files Director Vivek Agnihotri ANNOUNCES Mahabharata-Inspired Trilogy Parva. See First Look - Times Now
articles.description: Renowned director Vivek Agnihotri unveiled the first look of his next project Parva, which is inspired by Mahabharata. Spanning three parts, the film draws inspiration from S. L. Bhyrappa's book of the same title.
articles.content: Exclusive! Vivek Agnihotri To Announce His Next, Parva, Inspired From Mahabharata
